titleStmt.title: The boke for to learne a man to be wyse in buyldyng of his howse for the helth of body [and] to holde quyetnes for the helth of his soule, and body The boke for a good husbande to lerne.
Compendyous regyment or a dyetary of helth. Selections
titleStmt.author: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert Wyer, dwellynge at the [sy]gne of S. Iohn̄ Euangelyst, by s. Martyns parysshe in the felde besyde the Duke of Suffolkes place, at Charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Consists of the first 8 chapters of: Boorde, Andrew. A compendyous regyment or a dyetary of helth.
Imprint fropm colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
